verses.verse: A wise <S%H2450><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> heareth his father <S%H1><s%>'s instruction <S%H4148><s%>; But a scoffer <S%H3887><s%> heareth <S%H8085><s%> not rebuke <S%H1606><s%>.

A man <S%H376><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> by the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of his mouth <S%H6310><s%>; But the soul <S%H5315><s%> of the treacherous <S%H898><s%> shall eat violence <S%H2555><s%>.

He that guardeth <S%H5341><s%> his mouth <S%H6310><s%> keepeth <S%H8104><s%> his life <S%H5315><s%>; But he that openeth wide <S%H6589><s%> his lips <S%H8193><s%> shall have destruction <S%H4288><s%>.
The soul <S%H5315><s%> of the sluggard <S%H6102><s%> desireth <S%H183><s%>, and hath nothing <S%H5315><s%>; But the soul of the diligent <S%H2742><s%> shall be made fat <S%H1878><s%>.
A righteous <S%H6662><s%> man hateth <S%H8130><s%> lying <S%H1697><s%>; But a wicked <S%H7563><s%> man is loathsome <S%H887><s%>, and cometh to shame <S%H2659><s%>.
Righteousness <S%H6666><s%> guardeth <S%H5341><s%> him that is upright <S%H8537><s%> in the way <S%H1870><s%>; But wickedness <S%H7564><s%> overthroweth <S%H5557><s%> the sinner <S%H2403><s%>.
There is <S%H3426><s%> that maketh himself rich <S%H6238><s%>, yet hath nothing <S%H7326><s%>: There is that maketh himself poor, yet <S%H3605><s%> hath great <S%H7227><s%> wealth <S%H1952><s%>.
The ransom <S%H3724><s%> of a man <S%H376><s%>'s life <S%H5315><s%> is his riches <S%H6239><s%>; But the poor <S%H7326><s%> heareth <S%H8085><s%> no threatening <S%H1606><s%>.
The light <S%H216><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> rejoiceth <S%H8055><s%>; But the lamp <S%H5216><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> shall be put out <S%H1846><s%>.
By pride <S%H2087><s%> cometh <S%H5414><s%> only contention <S%H4683><s%>; But with the well-advised <S%H3289><s%> is wisdom <S%H2451><s%>.
Wealth <S%H1952><s%> gotten by vanity <S%H1892><s%> shall be diminished <S%H4591><s%>; But he that gathereth <S%H6908><s%> by labor <S%H3027><s%> shall have increase <S%H7235><s%>.
Hope <S%H8431><s%> deferred <S%H4900><s%> maketh the heart <S%H3820><s%> sick <S%H2470><s%>; But when the desire <S%H8378><s%> cometh <S%H935><s%>, it is a tree <S%H6086><s%> of life <S%H2416><s%>.
Whoso despiseth <S%H936><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> bringeth destruction <S%H2254><s%> on himself <S%H3373><s%>; But he that feareth the commandment <S%H4687><s%> shall be rewarded <S%H7999><s%>.
The law <S%H8451><s%> of the wise <S%H2450><s%> is a fountain <S%H4726><s%> of life <S%H2416><s%>, That one may depart <S%H5493><s%> from the snares <S%H4170><s%> of death <S%H4194><s%>.
Good <S%H2896><s%> understanding <S%H7922><s%> giveth <S%H5414><s%> favor <S%H2580><s%>; But the way <S%H1870><s%> of the transgressor <S%H898><s%> is hard <S%H386><s%>.
Every prudent <S%H6175><s%> man worketh <S%H6213><s%> with knowledge <S%H1847><s%>; But a fool <S%H3684><s%> flaunteth <S%H6566><s%> his folly <S%H200><s%>.
A wicked <S%H7563><s%> messenger <S%H4397><s%> falleth <S%H5307><s%> into evil <S%H7451><s%>; But a faithful <S%H529><s%> ambassador <S%H6735><s%> is health <S%H4832><s%>.

Poverty <S%H7389><s%> and shame <S%H7036><s%> shall be to him that refuseth <S%H6544><s%> correction <S%H4148><s%>; But he that regardeth <S%H8104><s%> reproof <S%H8433><s%> shall be honored <S%H3513><s%>.

The desire <S%H8378><s%> accomplished <S%H1961><s%> is sweet <S%H6149><s%> to the soul <S%H5315><s%>; But it is an abomination <S%H8441><s%> to fools <S%H3684><s%> to depart <S%H5493><s%> from evil <S%H7451><s%>.
Walk <S%H1980><s%> with wise <S%H2450><s%> men <S%H2449><s%>, and thou shalt be wise; But the companion <S%H7462><s%> of fools <S%H3684><s%> shall smart for it <S%H7321><s%>.
Evil <S%H7451><s%> pursueth <S%H7291><s%> sinners <S%H2400><s%>; But the righteous <S%H6662><s%> shall be recompensed <S%H7999><s%> with good <S%H2896><s%>.

A good <S%H2896><s%> man leaveth an inheritance <S%H5157><s%> to his children <S%H1121><s%>'s children <S%H1121><s%>; And the wealth <S%H2428><s%> of the sinner <S%H2398><s%> is laid up <S%H6845><s%> for the righteous <S%H6662><s%>.

Much <S%H7230><s%> food <S%H400><s%> is in the tillage <S%H5215><s%> of the poor <S%H7218><s%>; But there is <S%H3426><s%> that is destroyed <S%H5595><s%> by reason <S%H3808><s%> of injustice <S%H4941><s%>.
He that spareth <S%H2820><s%> his rod <S%H7626><s%> hateth <S%H8130><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>; But he that loveth <S%H157><s%> him chasteneth <S%H4148><s%> him betimes <S%H7836><s%>.
The righteous <S%H6662><s%> eateth <S%H398><s%> to the satisfying <S%H7648><s%> of his soul <S%H5315><s%>; But the belly <S%H990><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> shall want <S%H2637><s%>.
